Title: Everybody comes to beat sparrows
Publisher: Chaohua meishu chubanshe (朝花美术出版社) Beijing
Notes: The campaign 'Kill the Four Pests' was directed against flies, mosquitoes, rats and sparrows. Sparrows eat grain from the fields, so they had to be killed. But sparrows also feed on insects, like locusts, that became a real plague once the sparrows had been exterminated.
